Message from the Superintendent:

At approximately 9:30 am today students were overheard making comments relating to a school shooter. These comments were overheard and believed to be factual, which created rumors of a threat within the high school. Community Announcement:

Hey ladies, if you know of any girls that would be good for this please talk to them. Only 1 more week left to apply and I have no applications!! I don’t think schools are announcing it! At least I have heard that Bermudian and New Oxford aren’t. Please spread the word.

Applications are now available for the 2018
Pa Apple Queen Contest. The contest will be held on October 14th during the National Apple Harvest Festival. Qualifications are:
A resident of Adams County, 16 yrs of age by September 1, and a sophomore or junior in High School. Applications are available at all area High School Guidance Offices or through me until September 10. If you know of a young lady that would be a good fit message me. No experience necessary but they will have to learn about the Apple industry and apples, be confident with public speaking and work with people of all ages.
Thank you Sandy Kime
